meta.name: Categorize Gmail emails using GPT-4o-mini with Multi-Label Analysis

name: Categorize Gmail emails using GPT-4o-mini with Multi-Label Analysis

parameters.content:
üéØ GMAIL ASSISTANT MULTI-LABELS (1-3 max)
===========================================

üöÄ HOW TO USE THIS WORKFLOW:

1Ô∏è‚É£ ACTIVATION
   ‚Ä¢ Click "Activate" button in top right
   ‚Ä¢ Verify Gmail and OpenAI credentials are configured
   ‚Ä¢ Workflow automatically monitors new emails

2Ô∏è‚É£ AUTOMATIC OPERATION
   ‚Ä¢ As soon as new email arrives
   ‚Ä¢ AI analyzes content (sender, subject, body)
   ‚Ä¢ Smart selection of 1 to 3 relevant labels
   ‚Ä¢ Automatic label application

3Ô∏è‚É£ ADVANTAGES
   ‚Ä¢ Only 1 ChatGPT call per email (cost-effective)
   ‚Ä¢ Up to 3 labels per email (more precise)
   ‚Ä¢ Automatic adaptation to existing labels
   ‚Ä¢ No configuration required

üí° BASED ON THE WORKING WORKFLOW
   Stable and proven version adapted for multi-labels

üéä READY TO USE! Activate and let the magic happen!

üìß EMAIL MONITORING
‚Ä¢ Checks every minute
‚Ä¢ Triggers on new emails
‚Ä¢ Retrieves message ID

ü§ñ AI MULTI-LABEL ANALYSIS
‚Ä¢ Optimized prompt for 1-3 labels
‚Ä¢ Cost-effective GPT-4o-mini
‚Ä¢ Structured JSON response
‚Ä¢ Smart contextual analysis

‚öôÔ∏è DATA PREPARATION
‚Ä¢ Filters system labels
‚Ä¢ Creates multi-label prompt
‚Ä¢ Optimizes for AI
‚Ä¢ Provides full context

üîß SMART PARSING
‚Ä¢ Parses JSON arrays ["label1", "label2"]
‚Ä¢ Fallback to single label format
‚Ä¢ Exact + partial matching
‚Ä¢ Avoids duplicates
‚Ä¢ Limits to 3 labels max

‚úÖ FINAL APPLICATION
‚Ä¢ Applies 1-3 selected labels
‚Ä¢ Uses labelIds array
‚Ä¢ Direct modification in Gmail
‚Ä¢ Automatic confirmation

üí° USAGE TIPS
‚Ä¢ Test with one email first
‚Ä¢ Check logs for debugging
‚Ä¢ Adjust prompt if necessary
‚Ä¢ Create specific labels before use
